channel.title: [VB] Progress Bar?
channel.description:
How do i make it to were the progress bar looks like its doingsomething?
ive tried
[code] Dim pgb(1) As System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar Dim i As Integer = 0 pgb(i) = New System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar pgb(i) = New System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar pgb(i).Dock = DockStyle.Fill pgb(i).Minimum = 0 pgb(i).Maximum = 100 pgb(i).Value = 50 pgb(i).Visible = True [/code]
and
[code] ProgressBar1.Style = ProgressBarStyle.Marquee[/code]
Help Meh Out Plz

what is the declaration for the sleep?

item.title: [VB] Progress Bar?
item.dc:creator: @cruel cruel
item.description:
@cruel wrote:

Set the value property according to the progress of the operation.
If you wanted it to just go from 0 to 100%, you’d do something like:

for i = 1 to pbar.maximum pbar.value = i sleep 50 next i

EDIT: I put the “sleep 50” in there to slow down the bar… you wouldn’t want to sleep normally as the loading operations themselves would be taking up the time, making a real progress indication.

Read full topic
